# uid2

[![NPM version](https:

Generate unique ids. Pass in a `length` and it returns a `string`.


## Installation

    npm install uid2

## Examples

Without a callback it is synchronous:

```js
uid(10)

```

With a callback it is asynchronous:

```js
uid(10, function (err, id) {
  if (err) throw err;
  
});
```
